9.ara-name: كتاب الحج عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Ya'la bin Umayyah narrated:A Hadith similar to no. 835 with a different chain

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الَّذِي يُحْرِمُ وَعَلَيْهِ قَمِيصٌ أَوْ جُبَّةٌ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The One Who Assumed Ihram While Wearing A Shirt Or A Cloak
